name: Rohan Bavishi
details: I completed my Ph.D. at the University of California, Berkeley, where I was advised by Koushik Sen. I was also a member of the Programming Systems group. My research focused on designing tools and techniques for improving the productivity of programmers, specifically data scientists. Where professor Koushik Sen adivesd me a lot of things which were very effective in my later life.

name: Rohan Padhye
details: I completed my Ph.D. in Computer Science at UC Berkeley, where I was advised by Koushik Sen. My dissertation investigated techniques for specializing program analysis and automated testing tools using artifacts that incorporate the knowledge of domain experts.He advise me a lot of outcomes and pushed me when i was struggling .I got my inspiration of being  professor from him.

name: Liang Gong
details: Before joining Facebook, I obtained my Computer Science Ph.D. degree from UC Berkeley in 2018. My research adviser at Berkeley was Prof. Koushik Sen. As he is very experinced he advised me a lot of things about my research,how to start and from where to collect resources.
